argSrc: I think Berlin with its two inner-city airports was lucky not having to experience an airplane catastrophe for decades.
argTrg: For safety reasons alone I find continued operation wrong.

argSrc: I think Berlin with its two inner-city airports was lucky not having to experience an airplane catastrophe for decades.
argTrg: Also, Berlin urgently needs inner-city areas for business and industry, and for housing.
